column1: Little Goat Diner////The service was great
column2: our server really knew the menu and was ready to recommend something from any part of the menu. We stared with the pizza bread
column3: I could not get enough of the stewed tomato sauce. For entrees
column4: two of us got the veggie burger and I got the Korean burger. The veggie burger patty had identifiable veggies
column6: though the patties had a little trouble staying together
column7: but they were very flavorful! Â The Korean burger was amazing
column8: the egg was cooked perfectly and really reminded me of a Bim Bop! Next time
column9: I'd go with the beef or chicken patty over the goat though
column10: I felt that the goat patty took away from the overall burger.
